mapper.sql: id, class_id, course_id, order_index, enabled, create_time, update_time, creator, updater
mapper.select: SELECT cc.id, cc.class_id, cc.course_id, cc.order_index, cc.enabled, cc.create_time, cc.update_time, cc.creator, cc.updater, c.name as course_name, c.description as course_description, c.cover_picture as course_cover_picture, c.price as course_price, c.average_score as course_average_score FROM class_course cc LEFT JOIN course c ON cc.course_id = c.id WHERE cc.class_id = #{classId} AND cc.enabled = true ORDER BY cc.order_index ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_course (class_id, course_id, order_index, enabled, create_time, update_time, creator, updater) VALUES (#{classCourse.classId}, #{classCourse.courseId}, #{classCourse.orderIndex}, #{classCourse.enabled}, #{classCourse.createTime}, #{classCourse.updateTime}, #{classCourse.creator}, #{classCourse.updater})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM class_course WHERE class_id = #{classId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
